meanings.definition: A person or thing that juices fruits or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom is one of the best juicers in our family, always making delicious and healthy drinks.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new juicer to make fresh orange juice every morning.
meanings.sent3: The juicers at the farmer's market were working hard to squeeze out all the juice from the fruits.
meanings.sent4: She was like a juicer, extracting all the information from the books she read.
meanings.sent5: The juicers in the kitchen were humming with activity, preparing nutritious drinks for everyone.

meanings.definition: A device used to extract juice from fruits or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The juicers in the store come in different sizes and colors to suit everyone's needs.
meanings.sent2: I need to clean the juicer after making a fresh batch of carrot juice.
meanings.sent3: The juicers on the countertop were having a conversation about which fruit they liked juicing the most.
meanings.sent4: The juicer worked like magic, turning a bunch of oranges into a refreshing drink in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise of the juicer filled the kitchen as it processed the fruits into a healthy beverage.
